commModelList.description: Specifies a list of commModel. It can be used by NF and NF services to interact with each other in 5G Core network

configurable5QISetRef.description: DN of the Configurable5QISet that the SMFFunction supports (is associated to).

dynamic5QISetRef.description: DN of the Dynamic5QISet that the SMFFunction supports (is associated to).

pLMNIdList.description: A list of PLMN identifiers (Mobile Country Code and Mobile Network Code).

sBIFQDN.description: The FQDN of the registered NF instance in the service-based interface.

sNSSAIList.description: List of S-NSSAIs the managed object is capable of supporting. (Single Network Slice Selection Assistance Information) An S-NSSAI has an SST (Slice/Service type) and an optional SD (Slice Differentiator) field.
